tldr: Affected versions of the package fail to properly check `update` permissions when using the `connect` operator to establish relationships between entities, particularly when the update originates from a polymorphic model. This allows unauthorized users to bypass authorization controls.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `zenstack` library to the patch version.
